meanings.definition: A person or thing that stacks.
meanings.sent1: The stacker neatly arranged the books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse uses a stacker to organize boxes efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The playful stacker decided to build a tower of blocks.
meanings.sent4: She was a human stacker, always putting things in order.
meanings.sent5: The diligent stacker carefully piled the plates one on top of the other.

meanings.sent1: The stacker in the factory lifted heavy crates effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The automated stacker efficiently moves pallets in the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The stacker at the construction site never complained about the heavy loads.
meanings.sent4: The stacker hummed as it lifted the boxes with ease.
meanings.sent5: The powerful stacker could lift tons of materials with precision.

meanings.definition: A type of sandwich made with layers of ingredients.
meanings.sent1: The deli served a delicious stacker with ham, cheese, and lettuce.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a turkey stacker for lunch at the cafe.
meanings.sent3: The stacker was so tall, I had to squish it down to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The stacker looked like a colorful tower of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The mouth-watering stacker was a hit at the picnic.
